body_html:
For us, the absl dependence is not really important. We are not actively using it yet. We have the dependence in place for future expansion, and there is a strong feeling that we will actually be rolling it back and not using it for the next quarter or so. So, feel free to change the commit point of that dependence as you need to.

body:
For us, the absl dependence is not really important. We are not actively
using it yet. We have the dependence in place for future expansion, and
there is a strong feeling that we will actually be rolling it back and not
using it for the next quarter or so. So, feel free to change the commit
point of that dependence as you need to.

On Fri, Nov 3, 2017, 8:02 PM gunan <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Looks like with the latest prod push, and us also adding absl dependency
> there is a collision.
> I will try to see what is going on.
